DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate bioequivalence Lipidil® Supra ( fenofibrate 160mg ) versus SYO-0805 ( fenofibrate 65mg ) single dose oral administration .
DOC.brief_title: Relative Bioavailability Study Lipidil® Supra ( Fenofibrate 160mg ) Versus SYO-0805 ( Fenofibrate 65mg )
DOC.criteria: Healthy adult 2050 year age Weight 55kg within ±20 % IBW ( Ideal Body Weight ) Voluntary write informed consent History presence significant renal , neurologic , pulmonary , endocrine , hematology , oncology , urologic , cardiovascular , musculoskeletal psychiatric disease Drug allergies fenofibrate Recent history evidence drug abuse Recent participation ( within 2months ) clinical study Recent donation blood ( within 2months ) plasma ( within 1months )
